definitions.text: joint that forms a corner; usually both sides are bevelled at a 45-degree angle to form a 90-degree corner
the surface of a beveled end of a piece where a miter joint is made
examples: he covered the miter with glue before making the joint

definitions.text: a liturgical headdress worn by bishops on formal occasions
bevel the edges of, to make a miter joint
fit together in a miter joint
